title: Text-to-Story
p: Curious about CPF, investments, or retirement planning? Just type in your question or topic, and let our app guide you with clear and simple explanations. Easy peasy, lah!

title: URL-to-Story
p: Found a useful article online? Paste the URL here, and we'll break down the key points into easy-to-understand scenes, tailored for you. No more chim words, only simple advice.

title: Create a Story
p: Create your own financial journey! Move scenes around to customize your learning experience, just like arranging your favorite dishes at a hawker centre. Make it your own, step by step.
